function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Food truck implementing new ordering system due to pandemic","Impact":"Potential spread of virus through ordering process","Mitigation":"Implement contactless ordering and delivery systems","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering platforms","People":"Customers, food truck staff","Owner":"Food truck owners"},{"Description":"Transparency in food preparation processes","Impact":"Potential concerns about safety and hygiene in food preparation","Mitigation":"Frequent sanitization, use of personal protective equipment, and regular health check-ups for food truck staff","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, personal protective equipment, health monitoring apps","People":"Customers, food truck staff","Owner":"Food truck owners"}]}
